name: Ancient Tomb
description: Ancient Tomb enters the battlefield tapped and taps for 2 colorless mana at the cost of 2 life.

name: Birds of Paradise
description: Birds of Paradise is a mana dork that taps for one mana of any color.

name: Blind Obedience
description: Blind Obedience is an enchantment that slows down opponents' artifacts and creatures, also gaining you life when they enter the battlefield tapped.

name: Chord of Calling
description: Chord of Calling is an instant that allows you to search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield.

name: Crypt Ghast
description: Crypt Ghast is a creature that doubles the amount of black mana you generate when tapping swamps.

name: Legion Warboss
description: Legion Warboss is a goblin creature that creates 1/1 goblin tokens at the beginning of combat on your turn.

name: Mana Crypt (full art)
description: Mana Crypt is a powerful artifact that taps for 2 colorless mana, but it has a drawback of potentially dealing damage to you.

name: Mana Crypt
description: Older version of Mana Crypt, this powerful artifact taps for 2 colorless mana, but it has a drawback of potentially dealing damage to you.

name: Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer
description: Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer is a legendary monkey pirate that creates treasures when it deals combat damage to a player.

name: Savra, Queen of the Golgari
description: Savra, Queen of the Golgari is a legendary creature that lets you sacrifice creatures to drain life from opponents.

name: Sheoldred, Whispering One
description: Sheoldred, Whispering One is a powerful demon that brings creatures back from your graveyard and forces your opponents to sacrifice creatures.

name: Sliver Queen
description: Sliver Queen is a legendary creature that allows you to pay mana to create sliver creature tokens.

name: Temple Garden
description: Temple Garden is a dual land that can be tapped for green or white mana.

name: Teysa, Orzhov Scion
description: Teysa, Orzhov Scion is a legendary creature that creates spirit tokens when your creatures die and has the ability to sacrifice creatures for various effects.

name: Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre
description: Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre is a massive Eldrazi creature with annihilator and protection from colored spells.
